dev.b3nedikt.restring.internal.repository

Class SharedPrefStringRepository

  • dev.b3nedikt.restring.internal.repository.SharedPrefStringRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StringRepository

    public class SharedPrefStringRepository
implements StringRepository

    A StringRepository which saves/loads the strings in Shared Preferences.

    it's not ThreadSafe.
